tables.name: akash_block_events
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive overview of every action and occurrence within the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It includes detailed information about each block's transactions, enabling the analysis of the blockchain's behavior and evolution over time.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of a block within a blockchain network, representing its position in the chain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when a block was proposed and created within a blockchain network.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Unique index for each event happening within a blockchain block or transaction.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Category or type of event occurring within a blockchain, such as transaction or smart contract.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Custom attributes associated with a specific event in a blockchain protocol.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Node or source that originated a block event within a Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block event data was ingested into the dataset.

tables.name: akash_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blocks Table: This table provides information about blocks created in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details such as block height and timestamp, validators, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Consecutive numerical identifier for each block within a blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when a block becomes effectively finalized on the blockchain.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a blockchain network within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Address of the entity that proposes and broadcasts a new block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hash of validators responsible for validating transactions in a block.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block data was ingested from the blockchain network.

tables.name: akash_message_events
tables.description: This table contains event data extracted from Cosmos blockchain transactions. It provides a detailed view of the events occurring within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Opt-in blockchain sequence number, x=αλуmetric of block order

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was processed on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique transaction hash identifier for on-chain data

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Transaction index within a block, sequence number

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Message index within a transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Event index within a message, sequence number

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event that occurred on the blockchain

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Detailed attributes of the event that occurred

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into the database

tables.name: akash_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction information from the Cosmos ecosystem, including their status, fees, and associated block information. It provides a comprehensive view of interactions within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Total block count in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique transaction identifier within the blockchain

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Transaction details including amounts, addresses, and hashes

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Detailed logging of transaction events and outcomes

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Transaction memo containing optional additional information

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Transaction fee paid to validate and process the transaction

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Transaction execution result code (success, failure, etc.)

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Uniquely identifies a transaction within a block

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Combined gas consumed during transaction execution

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Total gas requested for transaction execution

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction data was ingested

tables.name: akash_tx_messages
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transaction Messages: This table contains raw data from transaction messages on various Cosmos chains. It provides a detailed view of the messages exchanged between validators in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential number of blocks in the Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when the block was created or committed

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each Cosmos blockchain network or hub

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction in a block or sequence of transactions

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction or block

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: Type of message or event being transmitted in the blockchain

columns.name: message
columns.description: Payload or content being transmitted in the blockchain

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version number of the data schema or format being used

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when the data was ingested into the dataset

tables.name: akash_validators
tables.description: Active Cosmos validators, a crucial component of the Cosmos Network, store and validate blocks ensuring the integrity and security of the chain. Their details are vital for users to choose a validator that suits their needs.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: Operator address for certificate holder in staking context

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: Akash account holding a validator in staking context

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: Public key for validator's consensus process

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: Flag indicating whether validator is jailed or not

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of a validator (e.g., bonded, unbonded, etc.)

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: Total tokens staked for a validator

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: Validator's unique identifier (human-readable nickname)

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Validator's identity information

columns.name: website
columns.description: Validator's official website

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: Contact information for validator-related security questions

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional information about validator

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: Block height at which unbonding process started

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: Timestamp of unbonding process start

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: Base commission rate collected by a validator

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: Maximum commission rate a validator can charge

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: Maximum rate at which validator commission can change

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: Timestamp for commission rate updates

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: Minimum self-delegation amount for a validator

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: Block height for snapshot data

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: Timestamp for snapshot data

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of data ingestion into Akash database
